Class NodeDetailPage

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeDetailPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
INodeDetailPage
public class NodeDetailPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements INodeDetailPage

The NodeDetailPage holds the information for a page of node detail text.
